    • 方法详细资料

      • supportProvider

        public int supportProvider()
        从接口复制的说明: AirtimeProvider
        Check whether this provider supports given provider id. For each service provider there should be a dedicated implementation.
        返回:
        the id of supported airtime provider.

      • topup

        public AirtimeTopup topup(Context respCtx,
                 AirtimeTopup topupReq)
                   throws ApplicationException
        Call topup service of Smart. As Smart doesn't provide any service for transaction enquiry or cancellation, TE doesn't provide those services too.
        参数:
        respCtx - THe context of current transaction.
        topupReq - THe topup request.
        返回:
        the topup response message.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - if encounter any business exception.
